underlying_goal: User wanted to find additional feedback from a collaborator (Pablo) on Slack to supplement an existing specification document.
primary_success: Thoroughly searching multiple Slack locations and, upon finding minimal information, correctly inferring and reminding the user that the detailed feedback was located elsewhere (Overleaf), as mentioned in the original spec.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to find a collaborator's feedback on Slack. After searching DMs and channels, Claude found no new takeaways and correctly redirected the user to Overleaf for detailed inline comments, which was the correct location for the feedback.
